investments.name: Taxpayer Services Modernization
investments.description: Digital taxpayer services including Online Account, IRS.gov, Direct File, and self-service tools

investments.name: Tax Processing Transformation
investments.description: Core tax processing including CADE 2, IMF replacement, MeF, and return processing systems

investments.name: Compliance Systems Enhancement
investments.description: Examination, collection, ACA, and criminal investigation systems

investments.name: Filing Season Infrastructure
investments.description: Filing season readiness, legislative changes, refund processing, and annual updates

investments.name: API Platform & Integration
investments.description: Enterprise APIs, microservices platform, and integration services

investments.name: Enterprise Infrastructure
investments.description: Data centers, cloud services, network, storage, and compute infrastructure

investments.name: Cybersecurity & Privacy
investments.description: Security operations, identity management, threat protection, and privacy compliance

investments.name: End User Digital Services
investments.description: Employee workstations, collaboration tools, and productivity suite

investments.name: IT Strategy & PMO
investments.description: IT strategy, enterprise architecture, portfolio management, and governance

workflows.name: Investment Creation & Approval
workflows.solution_b: Category-specific (Major: Full, Significant: Abbreviated, Infrastructure: Technical)

workflows.name: Baseline Change Request (BCR)
workflows.solution_b: Major: CCB Required, Significant: Manager Approval, Infrastructure: CAB Required

workflows.name: Project Initiation
workflows.solution_b: Major: PMO Full, Significant: PMO Standard, Infrastructure: ITIL Aligned

workflows.name: Risk Escalation & TechStat
workflows.solution_b: TechStat: Major only, Escalation: Significant, Security Focus: Infrastructure

workflows.name: Annual Budget Submission
workflows.solution_b: Major: Exhibit 300, Significant: Exhibit 53, Infrastructure: Tech Budget

workflows.name: Investment Health Assessment
workflows.solution_b: Major: CIO Rating (1-4), Significant: Standard Scoring, Infrastructure: Capacity Scoring

workflows.name: Treasury Monthly CIO Review
workflows.solution_b: Category-specific reviews (Major: OMB Visibility, Significant: Internal, Infrastructure: Technical)
